localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: On Nugget you’re the DJ of your own audio station. You can pull audio from all over the internet and add your voice to create a station about anything that interests you. You can also leave audio comments on your friends’ posts.
blogPost.body: On Nugget you’re the DJ of your own audio station. You can pull audio from all over the internet and add your voice to create a station about anything that interests you. You can also leave audio comments on your friends’ posts.
blogPost.title: Nugget - Share and record audio with your friends
blogPost.author: Craig Cannon

localize.description: 在Nugget上，你是你自己音频站的DJ。你可以从互联网上提取音频，并添加你的声音，创建一个关于任何你感兴趣的站。你还可以在你朋友的帖子上留下音频评论。
localize.tagline: 与朋友分享和录制音频

localize.description: 在Nugget上，你是你自己音頻站的DJ。你可以從互聯網上提取音頻，並添加你的聲音，創建一個關於任何你感興趣的站。你還可以在你朋友的帖子上留下音頻評論。
localize.tagline: 與朋友分享和錄製音頻
